short_summary: Creation of interactive questions and online courses
description: This requirement is for the creation of interactive questions and online courses regarding the International Experience Canada's (IEC) program.
duration_in_months: >input for duration in months goes here
full_summary:
###Government Tender Announcement: Secondary School Engagement
####Reference Number: cb-369-72816678
The Government of Canada has issued a tender announcement for the provision of interactive question and online course development regarding the International Experience Canada program. The awarded supplier will be responsible for creating engaging digital content, targeting secondary school students, to promote the IEc international experience program.

####Solicitation Number: CIC-156901
The tender notice was published on November 20th, 2023, and the submission deadline is December 12th, 2023, at 2:00 PM ET. However, please note that this tender has been CANCELLED.

####Procurement Category: SRV
The procurement category for this opportunity is Goods and Services, also referred to as SRV (Services).

####Notice Type: Request for Proposal
This tender exercise is being conducted as a Request for Proposal (RFP).

####Contracting Entity:
The contracting entity is Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada.

####Region of Opportunity/ Delivery:
The opportunity and delivery locations are both within the Canada region.

####Solicitation Method:
The solicitation method for this opportunity is Competitive - Open bidding. 

####Cancelation:
Please note that this tender has been CANCELLED 

For more information, please refer to the attached files from the Goverment of Canada's website 
[interactive questions and online courses regarding the International Experience Canada's (IEC) program](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24736/156901---rfp--secondary-school-engagement.pdf)
[questions and answers for round 1.](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24736/cic-156901---questions-answers_round-1---questions-et-reponses_tour-1.pdf)

You can contact the point of contact, Glauco Santos, if you have any inquiries at the following:
- Email: IRCC.BidsReceiving-Receptiondessoumissions.IRCC@cic.gc.ca
- Phone: (819) 664-7501
- Address: 70 Crémazie Street, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 1L1.

The contact person can be reached if you have any further inquiries. You can also visit the Government of Canada's official tender website for more information.

The end user agencies or their contact information are not provided in the text.

TO RESPOND TO THE
